item.title: How can i fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“jaspertje80, post:1, topic:425168”]hey,

i got this code right now.

[code] if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(14084,1)) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(55, npcType);
c.getItems().removeItem(14084,1);
c.getItems().addItem(4084,1);
c.sendMessage(“You recrieved a sled!”);

			}[/code]

but… item 14084 is not going out of the players inventory.
so the player keeps item 14084 and also gets 4084
how do i fix that the player only gets 4084 and 14084 is removed?[/quote]

try putting spaces between 14084,1 like this
14084, 1

Read full topic

item.title: How can i fix this?
item.dc:creator: @jaspertje80 jaspertje80
item.description:
@jaspertje80 wrote:

hey,

i got this code right now.

[code] if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(14084,1)) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(55, npcType);
c.getItems().removeItem(14084,1);
c.getItems().addItem(4084,1);
c.sendMessage(“You recrieved a sled!”);

			}[/code]

but… item 14084 is not going out of the players inventory.
so the player keeps item 14084 and also gets 4084
how do i fix that the player only gets 4084 and 14084 is removed?
